languages.text: "Допросите глав домов Драйвстем и Зауэрбэк. Кто-то из них стоит за всем этим. Когда мы обнаружим новые улики, объявите о публичной казни виновных. Прежде чем вынести решение, в обвинительной речи предлагаю уделить внимание каждому семейству, а я понаблюдаю за ними".

traits.locale_text: "Допросите глав домов Драйвстем и Зауэрбек. Кто-то из них стоит за всем этим. Когда мы обнаружим новые улики, объявите о публичной казни виновных. Прежде, чем вынесети решение, в обвинительной речи предлагаю уделить внимание каждому семейству, а я понаблюдаю за ними. Мой опыт подсказывает, что главный заговорщик находится здесь. Покажите, что уже раскрыли его, и он сам выдаст себя".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."
languages.original_text: "Допросите глав домов Драйвстем и Зауэрбэк. Кто-то из них стоит за всем этим. Когда мы обнаружим новые улики, объявите о публичной казни виновных. Прежде чем вынести решение, в обвинительной речи предлагаю уделить внимание каждому семейству, а я понаблюдаю за ними".

traits.locale_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback Houses. One of them is pulling the strings here. When we find the new evidence, announce that the guilty party would be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest to focus on each House in your indictment speech, and I will watch them."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback Houses. One of them is pulling the strings here. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

languages.text: 「ドライブステン家とザウアーバック家の当主を尋問しましょう。その家の者が糸を引いています。新しい証拠を見つけたらすぐ、犯人の公開処刑を宣言します。ロード・キャプテンが評決を発表する前に、告訴演説の最中は各家の動向を注視することをご提案します。我も彼らを見張りましょう」
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステン家とザウアーバック家の当主を尋問しましょう。その家の者が糸を引いています。新しい証拠を見つけたらすぐ、犯人の公開処刑を宣言します。ロード・キャプテンが評決を発表する前に、告訴演説の最中は各家の動向を注視することをご提案します。我も彼らを見張りましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “审讯德莱夫斯塔家族和苏尔贝克家族的族长，主使之人必在这两个家族之中。一旦发现新的证据，请您宣布公开处决有罪之人。在作出最终的判决前，我建议您仔细盘问各大家族，我来观察他们的反应。”
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: “审讯德莱夫斯塔家族和苏尔贝克家族的族长，主使之人必在这两个家族之中。一旦发现新的证据，请您宣布公开处决有罪之人。在作出最终的判决前，我建议您仔细盘问各大家族，我来观察他们的反应。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Interrogez les patriarches des maisons Drivestem et Sauerback. Si quelqu'un tire les ficelles, c'est forcément l'un d'eux. Une fois que nous aurons suffisamment de preuves, annoncez que les coupables seront exécutés sur la place publique, mais avant de prononcer votre verdict, je vous suggère d'inculper chaque maison. Quant à moi, j'observerai leur réaction et vous ferai part de mes conclusions. »
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: « Interrogez les patriarches des maisons Drivestem et Sauerback. Si quelqu'un tire les ficelles, c'est forcément l'un d'eux. Une fois que nous aurons suffisamment de preuves, annoncez que les coupables seront exécutés sur la place publique, mais avant de prononcer votre verdict, je vous suggère d'inculper chaque maison. Quant à moi, j'observerai leur réaction et vous ferai part de mes conclusions. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Interrogue a los jefes de las casas Drivestem y Sauerback. Alguno de ellos ha tenido que ser el que movía los hilos. Una vez que descubramos nuevas pruebas, anuncie que el culpable será ejecutado en público. Antes de pronunciar el veredicto, le sugiero que en su discurso mencione a cada casa y, mientras tanto, yo les observaré».
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: «Interrogue a los jefes de las casas Drivestem y Sauerback. Alguno de ellos ha tenido que ser el que movía los hilos. Una vez que descubramos nuevas pruebas, anuncie que el culpable será ejecutado en público. Antes de pronunciar el veredicto, le sugiero que en su discurso mencione a cada casa y, mientras tanto, yo les observaré».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Verhört die Köpfe der Häuser Drivestem und Sauerback. Einer der beiden zieht hier die Strippen. Wenn wir neue Beweise gefunden haben, dann verkündet, dass der Schuldige öffentlich hingerichtet wird. Bevor Ihr das Urteil verkündet, solltet Ihr bei Eurem Plädoyer kurz über jedes der Häuser sprechen. Ich werde sie währenddessen beobachten."
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: "Verhört die Köpfe der Häuser Drivestem und Sauerback. Einer der beiden zieht hier die Strippen. Wenn wir neue Beweise gefunden haben, dann verkündet, dass der Schuldige öffentlich hingerichtet wird. Bevor Ihr das Urteil verkündet, solltet Ihr bei Eurem Plädoyer kurz über jedes der Häuser sprechen. Ich werde sie währenddessen beobachten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Drivestem ve Sauerback hanelerinin başlarını sorguya çekmeliyiz. İpler, ikisinden birinin elinde. Daha fazla delil elde ettiğimizde faillerin halka açık bir şekilde idam edileceğini duyurmalısınız. Asıl kararınızı açıklamadan evvel iki haneyi de suçladığınız bir konuşma yapın. Ben de o sırada gözlüyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Interrogate the heads of the Drivestem and Sauerback houses. One of them has been pulling the strings here. Once we uncover new evidence, announce that the guilty party will be publicly executed. Before you pronounce the verdict, I suggest focusing on each house in your indictment speech, and I shall observe them."

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem ve Sauerback hanelerinin önderleri sorguya çekilmeli. İpler, ikisinden birinin elinde. Daha fazla delil elde ettiğimizde faillerin halka açık bir şekilde idam edileceğini duyurmalısınız. Kararınızı açıklamadan evvel ithamlarla ilgili hanelere yönelik bir konuşma yapın. O sırada ben de gözlüyor olacağım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
